question:
Write a letter to your friend inviting him/her to your family party. In your letter

– Explain why you are organizing the party.
– Describe what you are planning to do.
– Say how important it is to have your friend at the party.
text: I hope this letter finds you in radiant health and best of spirit. It has been a long time since we last met in Bangalore.
Anyways, I am writing to invite you to join a party at my home on Sunday 20 July 2019. Actually, I am organizing a party to celebrate the 25th wedding anniversary of my parents.

The ceremony will start with small worship, Then we will have fun with Keith and kin on load music. In addition, we will enjoy a delicious dinner which will include a wide variety of food ranging from local Rajasthani dishes to western cuisines.

Many of our friends have already accepted the invitation and eagerly waiting for the day to come. I am sure you are definitely going to have a super awesome time. Apart from this, I have booked a one day trip to Jaipur to visit JalMahal, Hawa mahal, Aamer fort, and your favorite water destination pink pearl.
Feel free to give me a call in case of any help.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of favorite is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
